name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_AUTH
description: This table is a bridge between authorization context SmartData element values and the source authorization records.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked authorization record that is associated with the SmartData element value.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.
